name: DefendCastle
description:
Defend Castle

Your job is defend your castle with deadly weapon as long as you can!!!!

CONTROLS

  • Mouse =>Aim machine gun.
  • Left click =>Shoot machine gun
  • A , D => Control canon.
  • S => Shoot canon.
  • C => FIRE SUPERLASER

WEAPONS

machine gun: Attack=>D ,Cooltime =>A
weak power but shot bullets rapidly and can kill Birds.

canon: Attack=>A , Cooltime => C
Very effective to Tanks, and can kill multiple enemies
but cannot kill Birds.

SUPERLASER:Attack=>SUPER, Cooltime=>SUPER
DESTROY ALL ENEMIES ON THE GROUND
but cooltime is also SUPERLONG and cannot kill Birds.

ENEMIES

purple enemies:Attack=> C , Speed=>A, HP=>G
too weak but many.

orange enemies:Attack=>B, Speed=>C, HP=>A
Tank. they have high HP and be purple's shield.
shoot the canon.

green enemies:Attack=>A, Speed=>B,HP=>C
Bird. they fly and have a bomb.
Taken the bomb deals big damage to your castle
so you should kill them priority.

How long you survive!?!?

I am Japanese so bad English sorry
